name: Delivery Desperado
description:
Delivery Desperado is a casual gig-economy racing simulator set in the fictional land of Neuropa.

Use full-screen (F11) for best experience

If the game runs slow, try downloading the stand-alone version for better performance.

OR

Make sure your browser uses the right GPU. To fix this in Chrome, follow these steps:

1. go to chrome://flags/

2. search for "Choose ANGLE graphics backend"

3. set to OpenGL
